sentences.sentence: These three stanzas are also said to have been added by the reciters.
sentences.translation: 这三段韵诗中据说也已补充到诵文中。

sentences.sentence: My father's follower Kishori belonged at one time to a band of reciters of Dasarathi's jingling versions of the Epics.
sentences.translation: 父亲的随从基肖里曾一度是达萨拉提叙事诗弹唱团的一员。
